Address.Address1: 203 Moo 1; Had Yao (Long Beach); Tumbol Talingchan; Nuangklong

Description.Text:
Location
Surrounded by pristine beaches and offering scenic views, this beachside resort is close to popular attractions such as the Prah Nang Caves and Tham Sadet. Krabi Town is 4.5 km away, where guests will find links to the public transport network. Krabi International Airport lies some 30 km from the accommodation.
Facilities
This quaint and charming resort comprises 9 deluxe suites in total and welcomes guests into a lobby with a safe and wireless Internet access (fees apply). There is a restaurant on the grounds and laundry services are also available. Guests arriving by vehicle can make use of the car park and 24-hour security is provided. Those looking to explore the surrounding area can book tours at the resort's reception.
Rooms
Each suite has its own unique layout, catering for differences in taste. They are all decorated in the Mediterranean style and come equipped with queen-size beds, a wardrobe and chest of drawers, an LCD TV, a computer with Internet access, an MP3 player, a safety deposit box, a minibar, a refrigerator and individually regulated air conditioning. The sunlit en suite bathrooms have been fitted with a shower, bath and hairdryer, and the outside terrace and dining area surrounded by shady trees is the ideal place to relax.
Sports/Entertainment
The resort features a sublime outdoor swimming pool with fresh, non-chlorinated water and for an additional fee, guests can hire parasols by the water's edge. Active types can go canoeing (fees apply) and rejuvenating Thai massage therapies can be booked on site.
Meals
The restaurant serves a delicious range of Thai and international Ã la carte dishes. Breakfast is served daily.
Payment
American Express, JCB, MasterCard and VISA are all accepted as methods of payment at this resort.
Misc.
Check-in is after 2 pm and check-out is before 12 noon.
How to get there
The resort is located at Had Yao, Krabi, a 20-minute drive from Krabi International Airport.
